metadata.title: Zooplankton Database
metadata.description: Dataset which holds most of the zooplankton sampling station data in the NE Pacific Ocean taken by the Institute of Ocean Sciences and Pacific Biological Station from about 1983 to present. May be data collected for projects such as JGOFS, GLOBEC, La Perouse, SUPER, Line P, Station P, Haida Eddy, euphausid stock assessment, Bowie Seamount.
keywords: JGOFS, GLOBEC, La Perouse, SUPER, Line P, Station P, Haida Eddy, Stock Assessment
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Supports scientific and environmental research.

Supplemental Information: Physical samples exist for this dataset. Custom software is available for use with this dataset.

Status: In Work

Maintenance frequency: As needed

Access constraints: Public

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: These data are provided "as-is".
